attributes.action: Completely remove any intention of introducing Rod licensing in the forthcoming Marine Bill which is open for comments until the end of March.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Licencing of Sea Anglers involved in leisure pursuits must not take place as such licencing will be difficult to control , administer, and police. It will not contribute to any improvement in fish stocks or fisheries management in fact it will (based on the Portugese experience ) adversely effect the fishing economy.
